name: Banneret
description: Bannerets are knights who inspire greatness in others through their actions and bravery in battle. They lead by example, turning even the most poorly equipped militia into a formidable force. Banneret serves as the archetype for the Purple Dragon Knight or similar warlords.

rallying_cry.description: When you use your Second Wind feature, you can choose up to three allied creatures within 60 feet of you. Each regains hit points equal to your fighter level, provided they can see or hear you.

royal_envoy.description: You gain proficiency in Persuasion (or another skill if already proficient). Your proficiency bonus is doubled for any ability check using Persuasion.

inspiring_surge.description: When you use Action Surge, you can choose one allied creature within 60 feet to make one melee or ranged weapon attack with its reaction. At 18th level, you can choose two allies instead of one.

bulwark.description: You can extend the benefit of your Indomitable feature to an ally. When you use Indomitable to reroll a saving throw and you aren't incapacitated, you can allow one ally within 60 feet who also failed its saving throw to reroll its saving throw and must use the new roll.
